rooms.description: Small entrance hall with reception area.
Spacious living room with natural light and Vastu compliant orientation, central to the house layout.
Adjacent to the kitchen, ensuring easy access for meals.
Functional kitchen space with ample storage and ventilation.
Compact gym area featuring multipurpose exercise equipment to promote fitness while conserving space.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with Vastu for positive energy flow.
Spacious balcony near the living area providing natural light and air circulation.
